pageContext.claim: “We can't allow Mexico to have a NAFTA deal that gives them over $100 billion, and I call it profit. You know, you can divide that up any way you want to do it, I call it profit.”
pageContext.analysis: Counting goods and services, the trade deficit with Mexico was $64.1 billion in 2017, according to the Office of the U.S. Trade Representative. Moreover, countries do not "lose" money on trade deficits -- or earn it from trade surpluses.
